languages.text: {n}Грудь сержанта обтягивает крепкий флак-жилет со знаками различия, принятыми у ваших солдат. Видимо, кто-то из {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}посланных вами блюстителей{/d} вручил его Малгару в качестве подарка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Грудь сержанта обтягивает крепкий флак-жилет со знаками различия, принятыми у ваших солдат. Видимо, кто-то из посланных вами блюстителей вручил его Малгару в качестве подарка.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Грудь сержанта обтягивает крепкий флак-жилет со знаками различия, принятыми у ваших солдат. Видимо, кто-то из {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}посланных вами блюстителей{/d} вручил его Малгару в качестве подарка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignias customary among your troops. One of the fighters you sent must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignias customary among your troops. One of the fighters you sent must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the enforcers you sent must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}
{n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the enforcers you sent must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

{n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the enforcers you sent must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Sergeant trägt eine robust wirkende Armaplastweste, die mit den Symbolen deiner Truppen versehen ist. Einer der {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}Enforcer{/d}, die du geschickt hast, muss sie Malgar geschenkt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Sergeant trägt eine robust wirkende Armaplastweste, die mit den Symbolen deiner Truppen versehen ist. Einer der Enforcers, die du geschickt hast, muss sie Malgar geschenkt haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le sergent porte une solide veste pare-balles portant l'insigne réglementaire de vos troupes. L'un des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}hommes que vous lui avez envoyés{/d} a dû le lui offrir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sergent porte une solide veste pare-balles portant l'insigne réglementaire de vos troupes. L'un des {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}hommes que vous lui avez envoyés{/d} a dû le lui offrir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位军士穿着一件坚固的防弹背心，上面带着你的军队的常见徽记。肯定是{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}你派出的某位执法者{/d}把它作为礼物送给了马尔加。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位军士穿着一件坚固的防弹背心，上面带着你的军队的常见徽记。肯定是你派出的某位执法者把它作为礼物送给了马尔加。{/n}

languages.text: {n}軍曹の胸には頑丈そうなフラック・ベストが装着されており、そこにはあなたの軍隊で使われる記章が付いている。あなたが{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}派遣したエンフォーサー{/d}の一人がマルガーに与えたに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}軍曹の胸には頑丈そうなフラック・ベストが装着されており、そこにはあなたの軍隊で使われる記章が付いている。あなたが派遣した執行官の一人がマルガーに与えたに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El sargento lleva en el pecho un chaleco antimetralla robusto con las insignias típicas de tus tropas. Alguien del {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}personal de seguridad que enviaste{/d} debe de habérsela dado a Malgar como regalo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El sargento lleva en el pecho un chaleco antimetralla robusto con las insignias típicas de tus tropas. Alguien del personal de seguridad que enviaste debe habérsela dado a Malgar como regalo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çavuşun üstünde, normalde senin güçlerinin kullandığı nişanı taşıyan sağlam görünümlü bir savar yelek var. {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}Gönderdiğin takviye kuvvetten{/d} bir asker hediye etmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sergeant's chest is fitted with a sturdy-looking flak vest bearing insignia customary among your troops. One of the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}enforcers you sent{/d} must have given it to Malgar as a gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Çavuşun üstünde, normalde senin kuvvetlerinin kullandığı nişanı taşıyan sağlam görünümlü bir yelek var. Gönderdiğin takviyelerden biri hediye etmiş olmalı.{/n}
